name: Birth of Henry Miller
description: Born in Manhattan, New York City.

name: Moved to Williamsburg, Brooklyn
description: Lived at 662 Driggs Avenue, Williamsburg, Brooklyn (≈ 9 years).

name: Moved to Bushwick, Brooklyn
description: Family moved to 1063 Decatur Street, Bushwick, Brooklyn.

name: Married Beatrice Sylvas Wickens
description: Married Beatrice Sylvas Wickens.

name: Attended Eastern District High School
description: Attended Eastern District High School; active with the Socialist Party of America.

name: Birth of Barbara
description: Daughter Barbara born.

name: Started working at Western Union
description: Began working at Western Union as personnel manager in the messenger department.

name: Moved to Park Slope, Brooklyn
description: Lived in an apartment at 244 6th Avenue, Park Slope, Brooklyn.

name: Divorced Beatrice Sylvas Wickens
description: Divorced Beatrice Sylvas Wickens.

name: Met June Mansfield
description: Met June Mansfield (Juliet Edith Smerth) while still married to Beatrice.

name: Married June Mansfield
description: Married June Mansfield.

name: Quit Western Union
description: Quit Western Union to dedicate himself to writing.

name: Spent time in Paris with June
description: Spent several months in Paris with June, financed by Freedman.

name: Moved to Paris unaccompanied
description: Moved to Paris, France, unaccompanied.

name: Kronski died by suicide
description: Kronski died by suicide; Miller suspected a sexual relationship between Kronski and June.

name: Employed by the Chicago Tribune Paris edition
description: Employed by the Chicago Tribune Paris edition as proofreader.

name: Began a relationship with Anaïs Nin
description: Began a relationship with Anaïs Nin.

name: First printing of Tropic of Cancer
description: Anaïs Nin financed the first printing of *Tropic of Cancer*.

name: June divorced Miller by proxy
description: June divorced Miller by proxy in Mexico City.

name: Learned about George Dibbern's memoir Quest
description: Learned about and helped promote George Dibbern’s memoir *Quest*.

name: Invited to Greece
description: Lawrence Durrell invited Miller to Greece.

name: Returned to New York
description: Returned to New York.

name: Visited Greece
description: Visited Greece; experience later described in *The Colossus of Maroussi*.

name: Published The Colossus of Maroussi
description: *The Colossus of Maroussi* published.

name: Moved to California
description: After a year-long trip around the United States, moved to California (initially just outside Hollywood in Beverly Glen).

name: Began writing Sexus
description: Began writing *Sexus*, the first novel in *The Rosy Crucifixion* trilogy.

name: Published Tropic books
description: *Tropic* books were published in France by Obelisk Press and later Olympia Press, banned in the U.S.

name: Settled in Big Sur
description: Settled in Big Sur, California.

name: Married Janina Martha Lepska
description: Married Janina Martha Lepska; had two children: son Tony and daughter Valentine.

name: Lived in a small house on Partington Ridge
description: Lived in a small house on Partington Ridge, California, with other bohemian writers; paid $5 / month rent.

name: Divorced Janina Martha Lepska
description: Divorced Janina Martha Lepska.

name: Married Eve McClure
description: Married Eve McClure.

name: Divorced Eve McClure
description: Divorced Eve McClure.

name: Reunited with June in New York
description: Arranged a reunion in New York with ex-wife June.

name: Moved to Pacific Palisades, Los Angeles
description: Moved to 444 Ocampo Drive, Pacific Palisades, Los Angeles.

name: Married Hoki Tokuda
description: Married Hoki Tokuda (Hiroko Tokuda).

name: Signed the Writers and Editors War Tax Protest pledge
description: Signed the Writers and Editors War Tax Protest pledge.

name: Nominated for the Nobel Prize in Literature
description: Nominated for the Nobel Prize in Literature by Allan Philip.

name: Divorced Hoki Tokuda
description: Divorced Hoki Tokuda.

name: Corresponded with Brenda Venus
description: Correspondence with Brenda Venus (over 1,500 letters).

name: Filmed for the 1981 film Tropic of Cancer
description: Filmed for the 1981 film *Tropic of Cancer*.

name: Died in Deia, Mallorca
description: Died in Deia, Mallorca.
